findings.title: Deployer cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The deployer loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Deployer cannot pause/lock the contract
findings.description: The deployer lacks the ability to pause or lock the contract after deployment.

findings.title: Deployer cannot burn tokens
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the ability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Deployer can set max transaction limit
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set a maximum transaction limit, which could lead to unintended restrictions on transactions.

findings.title: Deployer can set and modify taxes/fees with an indefinite amount
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to set and modify taxes or fees without any limitations, which could lead to potential exploitation.
